officialTitle: Low Dose Intraoperative Intravenous Ketamine Combination With Spinal Morphine for Post Thoracic Surgery Pain : A Randomized Control Study
inclusionCriteria:
* ASA physical status 1-3
* elective thoracotomy
* can operate patient-controlled analgesia (PCA) machine
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusionCriteria:
patient with history of

* allergy to morphine or ketamine
* contraindicate to ketamine
* remain intubated in the postoperative period
